author: dragan2836472
content: Hey there, does anyone know how are EIPs merged into "official" ethereum roadmap? Anyone can suggest an EIP, but how is the decision being made of which EIPs are confirmed etc. Can anyone point me to an article/blog post explaning this in details?

author: samwilsn
content: Deciding whether an EIP is accepted to go on mainnet happens on a biweekly call. The details are posted regularly in <#745077610685661265>

author: abcoathup
content:
Apparent number sniping, 3 minutes after 7499, 1 minute after 7500

Though there is a spec in both PRs, so I am not manually renumbering (as per EIP6968):
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7500
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7501

I commented on both PRs
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7500#issuecomment-1684476709
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7501#issuecomment-1684475316

We are now in the sequential numbering era of EIP/ERC numbering
